speaker: speaker2
text: Is there a big generation gap between parents and their children in you country ?

speaker: speaker1
text: Yes , there is . Teenagers do not want to live traditional lives . They want to go out , have fun , and explore the world . They want to develop their own view of life . Parents usually try to discourage them , but they don ’ t often succeed .

speaker: speaker2
text: Parents usually give their children more freedom in my country . Sometimes they give them too much freedom .

speaker: speaker1
text: It ’ s almost impossible to get the right balance . If you are too strict , kids might ignore you . If you are too lenient , they might go wild .
